mapper.insert: insert into ALR_STD_INVOICE_RECORD (FILE_ID, BATCH_ID, FILE_NAME, ACCOUNT_PERIOD, IS_VALID, UPDATE_DATE, CUSTOM_ID, FINANCE_DISK_TYPE) values (#{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountPeriod,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{financeDiskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ALR_STD_INVOICE_RECORD set BATCH_ID = #{batchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNT_PERIOD = #{accountPeriod,jdbcType=DATE}, IS_VALID = #{isValid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOM_ID = #{customId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FINANCE_DISK_TYPE = #{financeDiskType,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select FILE_ID, BATCH_ID, FILE_NAME, ACCOUNT_PERIOD, IS_VALID, UPDATE_DATE, CUSTOM_ID, FINANCE_DISK_TYPE from ALR_STD_INVOICE_RECORD where FILE_ID = #{fileId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select FILE_ID, BATCH_ID, FILE_NAME, ACCOUNT_PERIOD, IS_VALID, UPDATE_DATE, CUSTOM_ID, FINANCE_DISK_TYPE from ALR_STD_INVOICE_RECORD
